decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (MGJB/2/LOC, MGJB/2/BLK, MGJB/2/X10, Flood Risk Assessment prepared by Jack Cruickshank Architects (unnumbered, no date), Design, Access and Heritage Assessment prepared by Jack Cruickshank Architects (unnumbered, no date). Received on 13 July 2016. MGJB/2/OD10 Rev. A. Received 07 September 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the house
